title: New: Flying Lotus – Ideas, Drafts & Loops
body:
In celebration of reaching 300,000 followers on Twitter, **Flying Lotus** has dropped a new collection of demos, rough beats and ideas for free download.

Featuring **Thundercat**, **Baths**, **Earl**, **Yeezus** and **Mapei**, as well as his own projects, **Captain Murphy** and **The Underachievers**.

Grab a free [download here](http://www.mediafire.com/download/6udrmt53tywgmtx/Ideas%2Bdrafts%2Bloops.zip).

> Hey u guys are gonna share this folder right? Pls pass it around. Pass to the homies. Rt the hell out of it.
> 
> > Let me show u somefinnnn
> > 
> > > Let me show u somefinnnn
> > > 
> > > — FLYLO (@flyinglotus) [December 10, 2013](https://twitter.com/flyinglotus/statuses/410493809848369152)
> > 
> > > Hey u guys are gonna share this folder right? Pls pass it around. Pass to the homies. Rt the hell out of it.
> > > 
> > > — FLYLO (@flyinglotus) [December 10, 2013](https://twitter.com/flyinglotus/statuses/410492854390120448)

Featuring Thundercat, Baths, Earl, Yeezus and Mapei, as well as his own projects, Captain Murphy and The Underachievers. Grab a free download here. Hey u guys are gonna share this folder \[…\]
